mapper.sql: uans_id, uts_id, qstn_id, subj_sctn_id, uans_content, uans_result
mapper.select: select uans_id, ual.uts_id, ual.qstn_id, subj_sctn_id, uans_content, uans_result , qstn.QSTN_TITLE from user_answer_list ual left join question qstn on ual.qstn_id = qstn.QSTN_ID left join question_type qtype on qstn.QSTN_TYPE_ID = qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID where uts_id = #{utsId} and qtype.QSTN_TYPE_ID = #{type}
mapper.insert:
insert into user_answer_list
uans_id,
uts_id,
qstn_id,
subj_sctn_id,
uans_content,
uans_result,

mapper.update:
update user_answer_list
uts_id = #{utsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qstn_id = #{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subj_sctn_id = #{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uans_content = #{uansContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uans_result = #{uansResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uans_id = #{uansId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_answer_list set uts_id = #{utsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qstn_id = #{qstnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subj_sctn_id = #{subjSctnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uans_content = #{uansContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uans_result = #{uansResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uans_id = #{uansId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
